name: Fire of Life
description:
IMPORTANT: For some reason third party cookies must be allowed for the game to work in the browser. Sorry

You awake on a meadow with nothing but a campfire to light your way. But be careful if this very campfire should ever emit his last spark you will be alone in the dark with your ghosts. You should better be starting to search some fuel. But will you stay true to yourself in your choice of fuel or will you give in to the dark whispers in your head to find more fuel in desperate times of need.

Fire sound effects were obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
All copyright for those sound effects belong to their original authors and not us.
